channel.title: D-claw spec help and other general things --317--
channel.description:
As i said in the subject the d claw spec for some reason does not work. when attacking something while using d claws i can click on the spec bar and the words will turn yellow but the spec does not happen. Big problem because i want players to be able to hav decent pking.
Also currently to open up a shop you need to right click and then click trade with the npc is there any way to change this so that you just hav to normal left click on the npc to get the shop inventory to open up? Same situation with bank. i need to right click then hit "use quickly" to get the bank to open up?
Thanks for the help ahead of time. [size=24pt]i am using a 317 server[/size]

item.title: D-claw spec help and other general things --317--
item.dc:creator: @3lv3n_snip3r 3lv3n snip3r
item.description:
@3lv3n_snip3r wrote:

Jessie Feil:

[quote]haha im new at programming wadda u mean by base

just give up[/quote]

Why be negative? You were once at his position.

Read full topic
